Uses of Class
rt.Material.ShadingSample

  • Packages that use Material.ShadingSample 
    Package Description
    rt
    Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer.
    rt.materials
    Implementations of the Material interface.

    • Uses of Material.ShadingSample in rt

      Methods in rt that return Material.ShadingSample 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Material.ShadingSample Material.evaluateSpecularReflection(HitRecord hitRecord)
      Evaluate specular reflection.
      Material.ShadingSample Material.evaluateSpecularRefraction(HitRecord hitRecord)
      Evaluate specular refraction.
      Material.ShadingSample Material.getEmissionSample(HitRecord hitRecord, float[] sample)
      Calculate an emission sample, given a hit record and a uniform random sample as input.
      Material.ShadingSample Material.getShadingSample(HitRecord hitRecord, float[] sample)
      Calculate a shading sample, given a uniform random sample as input.

    • Uses of Material.ShadingSample in rt.materials

      Methods in rt.materials that return Material.ShadingSample 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Material.ShadingSample PointLightMaterial.evaluateSpecularReflection(HitRecord hitRecord)
      Shouldn't be called on a point light

      Shouldn't be called on a point light
      Material.ShadingSample Diffuse.evaluateSpecularRefraction(HitRecord hitRecord) 
      Material.ShadingSample PointLightMaterial.getEmissionSample(HitRecord hitRecord, float[] sample)
      Return a random direction over the full sphere of directions.
      Material.ShadingSample Diffuse.getEmissionSample(HitRecord hitRecord, float[] sample) 
      Material.ShadingSample PointLightMaterial.getShadingSample(HitRecord hitRecord, float[] sample)
      Shouldn't be called on a point light
      Material.ShadingSample Diffuse.getShadingSample(HitRecord hitRecord, float[] sample)
